thread.title: New York State Democrats Reach Deal to Unify

author: Corinne Ramey
title: New York State Democrats Reach Deal to Unify
text:
New York state’s fractured Democratic senators announced Wednesday an agreement to unify, reshaping dynamics in Albany and paving the way for an expansion of Democrats’ power in state government.
A group of breakaway Democrats called the Independent Democratic Conference previously had formed a coalition with Senate Republicans, giving the GOP de facto control of the chamber. Under the new agreement, the dissident group, founded in 2011, will dissolve and join the mainline Democrats. If Democrats win two vacant seats in an...
